SEARCH
Package controller

Class CampOperationsController

java.lang.Object
controller.CampOperationsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseController
public class CampOperationsController extends Object implements BaseController
The CampOperationsController class is responsible for handling operations related to camp information. It interacts with the CampDB for database operations and uses CampListView and CampDetailView for displaying relevant information.
Since:
2023-10-28

    • verifyCampOwnership

      public boolean verifyCampOwnership(String campID, Staff staff)
      Verify if the camp exists and is owned by the staff.
      Parameters:
      campID - The ID of the camp to verify.
      staff - The staff attempting the verification.
      Returns:
      True if the camp exists and is owned by the staff; false otherwise.
